content.full_text: Notes for a Speech, 1 Show me another law like this—Legislating in the dark—Opening a wide door to fraud—He who asks equity must do equity—“Fixture”Bring in new parties—Redeeming creditors
paragraphs: Notes for a Speech, 1 Show me another law like this—Legislating in the dark—Opening a wide door to fraud—He who asks equity must do equity—“Fixture”Bring in new parties—Redeeming creditors

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote the text on page one.
